SELECT MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.MS_SS_ITEM_ID , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.ITEM_NAME , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.DATA_NO , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.USER_KEY , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.TS FROM MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM
WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.MS_SS_ITEM_ID , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.ITEM_NAME , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.DATA_NO , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.USER_KEY , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.TS FROM MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM WHERE MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM.MS_SS_ITEM_ID = :MS_SS_ITEM_ID

INSERT INTO MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM ( MS_SS_ITEM_ID , MS_VESSEL_ID , ITEM_NAME ,
SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :MS_SS_ITEM_ID , :MS_VESSEL_ID , :ITEM_NAME ,
:SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SHOUSHURI_ITEM SET MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID , ITEM_NAME = :ITEM_NAME ,
SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE MS_SS_ITEM_ID = :MS_SS_ITEM_ID
